definition[0]: a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted
definition[1]: to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
example[0]: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
definition[2]: to move with a lot of effort or force
example[2]: We ploughed through the thick mud.
definition[3]: a group of seven bright stars that can only be seen from the northern part of the world. They form part of the constellation (=group of stars) called Ursa Major, and in the US they are often called the Big Dipper.
